p: The mAbs mentioned above were used to modulate the immune response, but specific human monoclonal antibodies can also be used to neutralize SARS-CoV-2, for both treatment and prevention of COVID-19. Several neutralizing monoclonal antibodies against SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have potential cross reactivity against SARS-CoV-2 [ 212]. For example, recent studies showed that a monoclonal antibody (S309) derived from memory B cells from an individual convalescing from SARS-CoV infection are also capable of neutralizing SARS-CoV-2 [ 213].
